snippet.title: Olympics™ GO! Paris 2024 | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
BUILD, COMPETE, CELEBRATE!
Immerse yourself in the Olympic Games and train like a champion in 12 crowd-roaring mini-games. Dominate the swimming pool, master archery, and push your limits in track and field. Unleash your inner architect and build up your dream city around Olympic venues with iconic landmarks. Feel the thrill of competition, the joy of victory, and the satisfaction of creating something unique with Olympics™ GO! Paris 2024.

COMPETE IN 12 SPORTS
Master 12 Olympic sports, from the grace of archery to the adrenaline rush of track and field. Train hard, refine your technique, and compete for the ultimate glory - GOLD!

Compete in the following mini-games:
Archery
Artistic Gymnastics
Athletics - 100m
Basketball
Breaking
Cycling Track
Fencing
Golf
Rowing
Shooting - Skeet
Skateboard - Park
Swimming - 100m Freestyle

EXPAND YOUR OLYMPIC VENUES
Take the reins of a thriving city and enjoy the satisfaction of creation that celebrates the spirit of competition. Surround your Olympic venues with shops to boost attendance and maximize success. From charming cafes to iconic stadiums, every victory unlocks new upgrade options!

CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS
Compete for gold medals and rise to the coveted top spot. Join the fierce competition, refine your skills, and see your name light up the leaderboard!

CELEBRATE THE OLYMPIC GAMES
You’re a fan, coach, and champion all at once. The Olympic Games are about sportsmanship, pushing your limits, and achieving your personal best. Train your athletes and compete with fairness and grace. Fulfill your athletic dreams and experience the spirit of the world’s biggest sporting event with Olympics™ GO! Paris 2024, where the game puts the power into your hands.

Follow our social channels for the latest updates:
Website: https://olympicsgo.nway.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/nwaygames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/nWayGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nwaygames/
